docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-9 Some Drug Aid to Kosovo Is Criticized as Useless The World Health Organization said about a third to half of all of shipments of corporate drug aid were inappropriate and likely to gather dust in warehouses or have to be destroyed at government expense. Items deemed to be of marginal use included lip balm, hemorrhoid ointment and anti-smoking inhalers. A1 About a quarter of the Serbs in Kosovo -- more than 75,000 -- have fled the province in the 18 days since Serbian forces began pulling out, the Yugoslav Red Cross said. A8
